comments.body:
It looks the SuperAgentRequest needs to be augmented here to have the `submit` method:
https://github.com/Brightspace/node-siren-parser/blob/master/src/superagent.js#L37
Otherwise sample code from Readme won't work:
https://github.com/Brightspace/node-siren-parser/blob/master/README.md#L88

I did notice that while writing the test code, but the `submitHelper` function isn't exported and it's not referenced inside that file, so I'm not sure how that's running. Could that be a "bug" (in the docs)?
